# locations(at:)

**Instance Method**

Translates a point index set into a unit distance along the shape.

## Declaration

```swift
func locations(at indexes: IndexSet) -> [CGFloat]
```

## Parameters

- **indexes**: The index set of map points associated with the shape.

## Return Value

An array of [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CGFloat-swift.struct] values.

## Accessing the points in the shape

- **points()**: Returns an array of map points associated with the shape.
- **pointCount**: The number of points associated with the shape.
- **location(atPointIndex:)**: Translates a point index into a unit distance along the shape.
